document_data.name: ''Moradin's Will''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moradin's Will''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[mace]], imbued with divine magics of [[Moradin]], in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: This Moradite bludgeon possessed a ''+2'' offensive enchantment and it aided the wielder in recovering from various afflictions.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''Moradin's Will'' belonged to a pirate from the [[Sword Mountains]] named [[Kajin]].
